name: Where's My Key
description:
This Game is the submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022 and it was made in under 7 days.

The theme of the game jam was - It is NOT REAL

.........................................................................................................................................................................

You woke up in room and you have been locked up . You need to escape this room before the bomb blasts and you goes flying upside down.  

Solve the riddles present inside the room, use brain to decrypt them to find the key in order to unlock the door before the time runs out... 

Plot twist - You will find out inside the game !!! So don't curse me and do enjoy the game.

Don't get lose up  and don't give up !!!

.........................................................................................................................................................................

Controls

WASD - For Movement

Spacebar - To Jump

Hold Shift - To Run

Press E - To pickup Key, Notes and Interact with Door

Left Mouse Click - To Move Objects (only few of them moves)

**YOU CAN ONLY PICKUP KEYS IF CROSSHAIR TURNS TO RED** 

**Headphones are required for better sound experience**

Credits

Textures were taken from texturespbr.

Other models were used from sketchfab.

Sounds were used from freesound.org

Download Instructions

1. Download zip

2. Extract zip

3. Play the Game and Enjoy!!

*PS : This is my first Big Game Jam  and I know it's not a perfect  game  but I hope you will like it and do share your feedback and reviews
